trans-unit.source: Provides a regular expression to parse an encoded ASP.NET expression block.
trans-unit.target: 提供規則運算式剖析 ASP.NET 運算式區塊編碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions> classes are used internally by the .NET Framework to parse ASP.NET pages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions>類別用於在內部.NET Framework 所剖析的 ASP.NET 網頁。</xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspEncodedExprRegex"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspEncodedExprRegex"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspEncodedExprRegex"></xref> class with a specified time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.AspEncodedExprRegex"></xref>類別指定的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The `A_1` parameter represents the maximum time interval during which the regular expression engine tries to find a match before the operation times out and a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `A_1`參數表示的最大時間間隔期間的規則運算式引擎會嘗試尋找相符項目，作業逾時之前，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: A time-out interval, or <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=fullName> if matching operations should not time out.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔，或<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=fullName>如果比對作業不應逾。
